ticket.title: FAC: KeyPolicy artifact types for COI enforcement

in_scope: Define KeyPolicy types with custody domains
Define CoiRule for conflict of interest rules

steps: Define KeyPolicy struct with custody_domains and coi_rules
Define CustodyDomain struct with domain_id and coi_group_id
Define CoiRule struct with enforcement level
Write unit tests for COI validation

criteria: KeyPolicy defines custody domains with COI groups
COI validation prevents executor from reviewing own changeset

notes.security:
KeyPolicy enforces conflict of interest separation by ensuring
executors cannot be in the same COI group as changeset authors.
This prevents self-review attacks.
notes.implementation_details:
KeyPolicy fields:
- policy_id, policy_hash, schema_version
- custody_domains: Vec<CustodyDomain>
- coi_rules: Vec<CoiRule>
- delegation_rules: Vec<DelegationRule>

CustodyDomain fields:
- domain_id, coi_group_id, key_bindings
